title: The Incredible Journey of Pit Allen
summary: Pit Allen, a young tutor with a secret superpower, discovers his ability to manipulate time over the course of a week, using it to avert a crisis and transform his community.
summaryGerman: Pit Allen, ein junger Tutor mit einer geheimen Superkraft, entdeckt im Laufe einer Woche seine Fähigkeit, die Zeit zu manipulieren, um eine Krise abzuwenden und seine Gemeinde zu verändern.
summaryDutch: Pit Allen, een jonge tutor met een geheime superkracht, ontdekt gedurende een week zijn vermogen om tijd te manipuleren, waarmee hij een crisis afwendt en zijn gemeenschap transformeert.
summaryFrench: Pit Allen, un jeune tuteur doté d'un super pouvoir secret, découvre sa capacité à manipuler le temps au cours d'une semaine, l'utilisant pour éviter une crise et transformer sa communauté.

story.text: Pit Allen starts his week feeling energetic as he tutors local students in mathematics. Unbeknownst to him, it's during a particularly challenging problem that he first stops time briefly without realizing.
Pit feels eerie when he notices the clock frozen during a tutoring session. Confused but curious, he experiments, finding he can change the duration of these stops.
Excited by his newfound powers, Pit uses them to extend a tutoring session to help a struggling student master algebra, surprisingly embracing his mysterious abilities.
Pit’s attempts to balance his life and his secret start to take a toll. He's sad as he realizes the responsibilities that come with such power.
When a school bus breaks down near a precarious cliff, Pit triumphantly manipulates time to save the children on board. His heroic act goes unseen, but he feels fulfilled.
Pit spends a peaceful day reflecting on his actions and the potential of his powers. He decides to use his abilities discreetly to positively impact his world.
An epic culmination: Pit organizes a community event where he subtly speeds up time to ensure everything runs smoothly, earning the heartfelt gratitude of the neighborhood.

ending: Thus, Pit Allen forged his path as an unseen hero, quietly shaping a better future with each tick of the clock.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility, and the truest heroes are often unsung.
